messages.message:
:zap: :sunny:
Time to chat about migrating `instabase-public` from GCR to GAR! :slightly_smiling_face:
I'm going to hold off doing the full cutover until there's consensus on how much prep / warning our on-prem customers need, but I've done the pre-work so far:

1. :white_check_mark: *:* Registries created
2. :white_check_mark: *:* IAM policy applied to new registries
    a. :double_vertical_bar: :lists: *:* I have the new policy bindings copied locally for validation, but I'll need a list of on-prem customers that we believe are pulling from GCR currently.
3. :loading-7083: *:* Images are copying now - I didn't specify any retention constraints, so it will be copying ALL images for all time (those not deleted previously anyway).
4. :double_vertical_bar: *:* Cutover to start serving gcr.io (http://gcr.io) requests from GAR is going to be held until there's been sufficient comms to customers. I'll work @Aaron Tami and @Kerry and whoever else is appropriate to get a message drafted.

Ok, initial image copy is done!
Took ~3 hours, and copied....
```instabase-public: Successfully copied 19688 additional tags and 16277 additional manifests. There were 0 failures.```
... _and boy are my arms tired from shoveling all those images_
:dadjoke:


Ok I'll work out a better joke next time but whatever. :smile:
